ygData.subject: dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe 1 point is plent to put into dodge at first.  It goes up very quickly if you re a dark elf, and halfway through level 9 I had topped it off.  It
ygData.messageBody:
I believe 1 point is plent to put into dodge at first. It goes up very quickly if you're a dark elf, and halfway through level 9 I had topped it off. It seems like it fills up very quickly with each of my new levels, and works pretty often when fighting. I'm very glad to have this skill, think about it, you could potentially be completely avoiding an attack that would cause you to lose the battle, and that's not interrupting your AC, so when you dodge, you know they hit you, and you got lucky.

Kakarot Longwind :)
